ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Classification__c , ''), $User.Profile_Name__c !='System Administrator', $User.Profile_Name__c !='API DATA LOAD', RecordType.Name=='NavDB Accts',OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Propose to Close'),ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Done-Transferred'),ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Cancelled')) )
